dentists.name: Dr. Sarah Johnson
dentists.bio: Dr. Johnson is passionate about preventive care and helping patients maintain healthy smiles. She specializes in comprehensive dental examinations and restorative procedures.

dentists.name: Dr. Michael Chen
dentists.education: DMD, Harvard School of Dental Medicine
dentists.bio: Dr. Chen is an expert in creating beautiful, straight smiles using the latest orthodontic techniques including Invisalign and traditional braces.

dentists.name: Dr. Emily Rodriguez
dentists.bio: Dr. Rodriguez specializes in making dental visits fun and comfortable for children. She focuses on preventive care and building positive dental experiences.

dentists.name: Dr. James Williams
dentists.bio: Dr. Williams performs complex oral surgeries including extractions, dental implants, and jaw surgery with precision and care.

dentists.name: Dr. Lisa Thompson
dentists.bio: Dr. Thompson is dedicated to creating stunning smile makeovers through veneers, whitening, and other cosmetic procedures.

dentists.name: Dr. Robert Martinez
dentists.bio: Dr. Martinez specializes in root canal therapy and treating dental pain. His gentle approach ensures patient comfort during procedures.

dentists.name: Dr. Amanda Lee
dentists.bio: Dr. Lee focuses on the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of gum disease, helping patients maintain healthy gums for life.

dentists.name: Dr. David Kim
dentists.bio: Dr. Kim specializes in dental prosthetics including crowns, bridges, dentures, and implant restorations.

dentists.name: Dr. Jennifer Garcia
dentists.bio: Dr. Garcia provides comprehensive dental care with a focus on patient education and preventive dentistry.

dentists.name: Dr. Thomas Anderson
dentists.bio: Dr. Anderson diagnoses and treats diseases affecting the oral and maxillofacial regions, including oral cancer screening.

dentists.name: Dr. Maria Hernandez
dentists.bio: Dr. Hernandez ensures patient comfort through expert pain management and sedation dentistry techniques.

dentists.name: Dr. Christopher Taylor
dentists.bio: Dr. Taylor specializes in treating temporomandibular joint disorders and facial pain conditions.

dentists.name: Dr. Nicole White
dentists.bio: Dr. White is an expert in dental implant placement and restoration, helping patients restore their smiles permanently.

dentists.name: Dr. Daniel Brown
dentists.bio: Dr. Brown specializes in dental care for older adults, addressing the unique oral health needs of senior patients.

dentists.name: Dr. Rachel Green
dentists.bio: Dr. Green provides compassionate dental care for patients with physical, intellectual, or medical disabilities.

services.name: Routine Dental Cleaning
services.description: Professional teeth cleaning to remove plaque and tartar buildup. Includes polishing and fluoride treatment. Essential for maintaining oral health and preventing gum disease.

services.name: Comprehensive Dental Exam
services.description: Thorough examination of teeth, gums, and oral tissues. Includes X-rays, oral cancer screening, and personalized treatment planning.

services.name: Teeth Whitening
services.description: Professional whitening treatment to brighten your smile by several shades. Safe, effective, and provides long-lasting results.

services.name: Dental Veneers
services.description: Custom-made porcelain shells that cover the front surface of teeth to improve appearance. Perfect for correcting chips, gaps, or discoloration.

services.name: Traditional Braces
services.description: Metal or ceramic braces to straighten teeth and correct bite issues. Includes regular adjustments and monitoring throughout treatment.

services.name: Invisalign Clear Aligners
services.description: Virtually invisible aligners that gradually straighten teeth. Removable for eating and cleaning, offering convenience and aesthetics.

services.name: Dental Crowns
services.description: Custom-fitted caps that cover damaged teeth to restore strength, function, and appearance. Available in porcelain, ceramic, or metal.

services.name: Root Canal Therapy
services.description: Treatment to save an infected or damaged tooth by removing the pulp and sealing the root canal. Relieves pain and preserves the tooth.

services.name: Dental Implants
services.description: Permanent tooth replacement solution using titanium posts surgically placed in the jawbone. Looks, feels, and functions like natural teeth.

services.name: Wisdom Teeth Extraction
services.description: Removal of problematic wisdom teeth to prevent pain, infection, or crowding. Performed under local or general anesthesia.

services.name: Dental Bridges
services.description: Fixed prosthetic device that bridges the gap created by missing teeth. Attached to surrounding natural teeth or implants.

services.name: Dentures
services.description: Removable replacements for missing teeth. Available as partial or complete dentures, custom-fitted for comfort and function.

services.name: Gum Disease Treatment
services.description: Treatment for periodontal disease including deep cleaning, scaling, and root planing. Essential for preserving gum and bone health.

services.name: Smile Makeover
services.description: Comprehensive cosmetic treatment combining multiple procedures to completely transform your smile. Customized to your goals.

services.name: Emergency Dental Care
services.description: Prompt treatment for dental emergencies including severe pain, broken teeth, or knocked-out teeth. Available same-day.

services.name: Dental Bonding
services.description: Quick cosmetic fix using tooth-colored resin to repair chips, cracks, or gaps. Completed in a single visit.

services.name: Tooth Extraction
services.description: Safe removal of damaged or decayed teeth that cannot be saved. Performed with local anesthesia for patient comfort.

services.name: Pediatric Dental Exam
services.description: Child-friendly dental examination with special attention to growth, development, and prevention. Makes kids comfortable with dental care.
